txt.en: This quest is meant to show you how to interact with the LOTRO Store.

<rgb=#00FF00>This quest must be unlocked once for your account, and can be purchased from the LOTRO Store. Completing the quest 'A Little Extra Never Hurts -- Part 1' is not required to proceed, but will provide enough LOTRO Points to cover this purchase. 'A Little Extra Never Hurts -- Part 1' can only be completed once per account.</rgb>

To purchase this quest, click on the button on the lower left side of the Quest Dialogue window that says Unlock Quest. This will bring you to the web store interface. From there, you can choose to spend LOTRO Points to gain access to the quest.

You can use the store for a multitude of purchases, including access to regional questing, consumable items, expansion packs, craft recipes, cosmetic items, mounts, and much more.

While 'A Little Extra Never Hurts -- Part 1' can only be completed once per account, this quest, 'A Little Extra Never Hurts -- Part 2', may be completed by every character.
Talk to the quest bestower to complete this quest.

<rgb=#00FF00>This quest must be unlocked on your account, and can be purchased from the LOTRO Store. You received enough LOTRO Points to cover this purchase from 'A Little Extra Never Hurts -- Part 1.'

To purchase the quest, click on the button on the lower left side of the Quest Dialogue window that says Unlock Quest. This will bring you to the web store interface. From there, you can choose to spend LOTRO Points to gain access to the quest.

You can use the store for a multitude of purchases, including access to regional questing, consumable items, expansion packs, craft recipes, cosmetic items, mounts, and much more.</rgb>
'Excellent news. Accept this mount. It will carry you to and from battle, but it is not fit for fighting.'
'Excellent news. Accept this mount. It will carry you to and from battle, but it is not fit for fighting.'

You can use the store for a multitude of purchases, including access to regional questing, consumable items, expansion packs, craft recipes, cosmetic items, mounts, and much more.</rgb>
'Excellent news. Here, take this. It may not survive for very long, but it will likely help in the coming fight.'
